author: dimuthu
msg: Fixing https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/AXIS2C-1307, serializing sub tree fails when the namespace is from a parent in special occassions

author: niallp
msg: Fix fir IO-175 IOUtils.doCopyFile() issues with very large files and closing file input streams - thanks to David Sitsky

author: ajaquith
msg: Split .action package: ActionBeans (only) remain in .action, while Stripes support classes move to .ui.stripes. Also, the JSP migrator code moves to package .ui.migrator. Many Javadoc tweaks too.

author: lu4242
msg: MYFACES-2106 update getFactory method of FactoryFinder (since all factories implements FacesWrapper interface it is safe to call getWrapped, but we don't need a check for it in getFactory, since it is already when lookup on ABSTRACT_FACTORY_CLASSES).

author: mcconne
msg: GERONIMODEVTOOLS-539 Run on server testcases for the patch that Delos Dai provided for GERONIMODEVTOOLS-536
